column4: Can any of you say what the general rule of thumb is for when/if to install a new release of ubuntu? Do most people wait a while after most releases till theres a bunch of updates available so they dont run into major issues? Or is it just a jump in and start breaking stuff kinda thing and dont wait for anything?
Im just wondering cause 8.04.2 seems realy reliable now to me and 8.10 still has reliability issues for me.
Then keep using 8.04 since it's LTS
